MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: WinXP,Windows Vista Starter,Windows Vista Home Basic,Windows Vista Home Premium,Windows Vista Business,Windows Vista Enterprise,Windows Vista Ultimate,Windows Vista Home Basic x64,Windows Vista Home Premium x64,Windows Vista Business x64,Windows Vista Enterprise x64,Windows Vista Ultimate x64

English.Keywords: sync contacts ldap pim outlook nokia gmail facebook live
English.Char_Desc_80: Synchronize contacts from GMAIL, Outlook, NOKIA, Windows Contacts.
English.Char_Desc_250: Synrc Contacts a desktop Vista application that allows you synchronize personal contact information from different sources. This is the part of Synrc Remote Contacts project that synchronize personal contact information remotely through LDAP.
English.Char_Desc_450: Synrc Contacts is available to public community Sync engine. Focused on synchronization of contact Information from different sync sources: Windows Contacts, Outlook, NOKIA Phones, GMAIL, Yahoo!. It supports multithreaded contacts loading and updating from/to sync sources. First af all Synrc Contacts a desktop application that allows you synchronize personal contact information from different sources.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
Synrc Contacts supports following Sync Sources:
Windows Contacts Windows Live Contacts Outlook GMAIL Yahoo! NOKIA Phones Facebook LDAP, read for base inetOrgPerson class Synrc LDAP Server, read and write for Synrc Remote Contacts users PeopleSync(TM)
